Home.Description: I'm a passionate web developer with expertise in front-end development and UI/UX design. I love crafting beautiful and intuitive user experiences that make a difference.

About.Description: I have a strong background in computer science and several years of professional experience in web development. I am proficient in various technologies and frameworks, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.js. My goal is to create high-quality, scalable, and performant web applications that meet the clients' needs.

Timeline.Title: Full Stack Developer
Timeline.Description: Currently Freelancing as a full stack developer, responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications. Involved in all stages of the development process, from requirements gathering to deployment.

Timeline.Title: B Tech - CSBS
Timeline.Description: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Buisness Syatem, focusing on software development, algorithms, and data structures. Developed a solid foundation in programming principles and problem-solving skills.

Timeline.Title: HSC
Timeline.Description: I completed HSC in Computer Science, Physics, Maths, and Chemistry. Equipped with a comprehensive understanding of these subjects, I'm ready to apply my skills in problem-solving, software development, and scientific exploration.

Timeline.Title: SSLC
Timeline.Description: I successfully completed SSLC, showcasing my dedication and perseverance. This milestone highlights my strong educational foundation and sets the stage for future accomplishments.

Skills.Title: HTML5
Skills.Description: Proficient in writing semantic HTML markup and ensuring accessibility and cross-browser compatibility. Familiar with the latest HTML5 features and best practices.

Skills.Title: CSS3
Skills.Description: Strong knowledge of CSS3 and modern CSS frameworks. Skilled in creating responsive layouts, animations, and styling web applications to deliver an exceptional user experience.

Skills.Title: JavaScript
Skills.Description: Extensive experience in JavaScript and its frameworks/libraries like React.js and Vue.js. Proficient in writing clean, modular, and maintainable code to implement complex functionality.

Skills.Title: React.js
Skills.Description: Skilled in building responsive and interactive web applications using React.js. Experienced in working with React components, state management, and integrating external APIs.

Skills.Title: Solid.js
Skills.Description: SolidJS expert creating seamless web experiences through reactive programming and component-based architecture. Pushing the boundaries of modern web development.

Skills.Title: Nodejs
Skills.Description: Masterful Node.js developer crafting powerful and scalable server-side solutions. Expertise in building high-performance applications with real-time capabilities and seamless data integration.

Skills.Title: Expressjs
Skills.Description: Skilled in Express.js development, creating fast and efficient web applications. Proficient in routing, middleware integration, and database connectivity for building scalable and robust server-side solutions.

Skills.Title: Python
Skills.Description: Python aficionado adept at crafting elegant and efficient solutions. Experienced in web development, data analysis, and automation, delivering robust and scalable applications with finesse.

Skills.Title: C
Skills.Description: Skilled in C programming with a passion for creating reliable and efficient solutions. Experienced in developing software applications and problem-solving. Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and memory management.

Skills.Title: Flask
Skills.Description: Experienced in Flask web development, creating dynamic and scalable applications. Proficient in building RESTful APIs, database integration, and implementing robust authentication and authorization mechanisms.

Footer.Description: Welcome to my portfolio website! Here, you'll find a showcase of my projects, skills, and experience in the field of web development. Feel free to explore and get in touch if you have any questions or inquiries.
